+gen., on, upon; +dat., upon, on the basis of; +acc., against, upon
+acc., to, toward, in the presence of

so that, with the result that; so as

right; ἐν δεξιᾷ (χειρί) on the right (hand)
if, whether; εἴτε...εἴτε, whether...or,if...if (= εἰ + τέ)

not, nor; οὔτε...οὔτε, neither...nor (= οὐ + τέ)
